docs.lead_paragraph: IN the Puritan Boston of 200 years ago, or thereabout, a boy was born to all Irish mother. The father, as clearly as can be seen through the mists of time, "lay dying somewhere in the West Indies." This mother and father had been a brave pair.

headline.main: COPLEY KEEPS ALIVE OUR PRE-REVOLUTION AGE; Born 200 Years Ago, the Artist Assembled A Famous Gallery of Colonial Personages

docs.snippet: IN the Puritan Boston of 200 years ago, or thereabout, a boy was born to all Irish mother. The father, as clearly as can be seen through the mists of time, "lay dying somewhere in the West Indies." This mother and father had been a brave pair.
